subject: URGENT: Your account will be suspended
body:
Your Amazon account has suspicious activity. Click here immediately to verify: http://amaz0n-verify.suspicious-domain.com/login

If you don't act within 24 hours, your account will be permanently suspended.
snippet: Your Amazon account has suspicious activity. Click here immediately to verify...

subject: Make $5000 per week working from home!!!
body:
Amazing opportunity! No experience needed! Click now to start earning thousands from home with our proven system!

Call 1-800-GET-RICH or visit www.get-rich-quick.biz

subject: Meeting tomorrow at 2pm
body:
Hi,

Just confirming our meeting tomorrow at 2pm in conference room B. I'll bring the quarterly reports.

Best regards,
John
snippet: Just confirming our meeting tomorrow at 2pm in conference room B...

subject: Important security update from your bank
body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We have implemented new security measures for your account. Please log in to your account at https://www.yourbank.com to review these changes.

If you have any questions, please contact us at 1-800-YOUR-BANK.

Sincerely,
Your Bank Security Team
snippet: We have implemented new security measures for your account...

subject: Re: Project proposal
body:
Thank you for the detailed proposal. We're very interested in moving forward with this project.

Could we schedule a call this week to discuss the timeline and budget?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best,
Sarah Johnson
Important Corp
snippet: Thank you for the detailed proposal. We're very interested in moving forward...

subject: Your package delivery failed
body:
Your package delivery attempt failed. Please click the link below to reschedule:

http://fedx-delivery.net/reschedule?id=12345

Package details:
Tracking: 1Z999AA1234567890
Attempt: 1 of 3
snippet: Your package delivery attempt failed. Please click the link below...

subject: Newsletter: Tech Weekly #42
body:

subject: Congratulations! You've won $1,000,000!
body:
CONGRATULATIONS!!!

You have been selected as the winner of our international lottery! You've won $1,000,000 USD!

To claim your prize, please send us:
- Full name
- Address
- Phone number
- Bank account details

Reply immediately to claim your winnings!
snippet: You have been selected as the winner of our international lottery...
